title: Performance appraisal and personal development
brief_description: The principal aim of this video is to provide viewers with the knowledge and understanding of a performance appraisal system, the need for a positive and active role in the process and how the system will develop their performance and career prospects within an organisation. A manual accompanies this video and may be borrowed as a separate loan item.
